mapper.select: select sum(amount) from cDetail where id=#{id}
select sum(amount) from fDetail where id = #{id}
select c.title,category,d.amount,d.regdate,d.id from charity c, cDetail d where c.cnum=d.cnum and id = #{id}
select f.title,category,r.price,d.regdate,d.id from funding f,reward r, fDetail d where f.fnum=d.fnum and d.fnum=r.fnum and d.id=#{id} and d.state='w';
